basics.name: Elyssa Tobias, SHRM-CP
basics.label: Certified HR Professional - HR Analytics & Operations
basics.summary: SHRM Certified HR Professional with a demonstrated history of working across multiple industries. Skilled in Excel, Payroll, Recruiting, Benefits, ADP and Dynamics with people focus. Strong educational background with a Bachelor of Science Degree in Psychology and a minor in Human Resources Development from Texas A&M University.

work.name: Allucent
work.summary:
Human Resources Generalist of Allucent having previously held the role of Human Resources Specialist of Pharm-Olam, LLC, an acquired company by CATO SMS. CATO SMS has recently been rebranded as Allucent.

Data Maintenance: Update HRIS database records and process paperwork for new hires, terminations and other status changes. Performs HRIS data entry and personnel file maintenance. (PANs on POInt integrated to Freshworks case system)


Reports/Queries: Write, maintain and support a variety of reports or queries using appropriate reporting tools. Assist in development of standard reports for ongoing customer needs. Help maintain data integrity in systems by running queries and analyzing data. (weekly iCIMS manager recruiting, quarterly payroll pto for US/CAN/MEX, Dynamics extended leave, quarterly new hire for debarment checks, monthly pto accrual upload for US/CAN/AUS, quarterly pto requests/benefit accrual balances)  


Training: Develop user procedures, guidelines and documentation. Train customers on new processes/functionality. Train new system users. UAT testing of periodic upgrades before new Dynamics system goes live to employees


Provide support and guidance to hiring leaders and candidates to ensure effective onboarding of candidates into the HR systems


Dynamics 365, iCIMS and ADP, plus other operating systems functions and reporting


iCIMS: scheduling interviews for US primarily (helped fill positions for awarded government COVID projects as recruiter went on leave), create new requisitions, candidate and manager communications, weekly social media recruiting report for LI, kept system up to date


Dynamics365: setup new hires globally, processed terminations, created and completed PANs for any global EE/Contractor changes, monthly Dynamics to BI reconciliation for monthly headcount data report


Monthly CV/JD IT help for employees


Coordinated yearly company Top Golf event


Responds to reference checks and verifications of employment status

work.name: McKesson
work.summary:
Recruitment & On-boarding: Facilitates local hiring and contractor conversion process for hourly staff. Conducts new hire orientation and assist with the new hire on boarding process


Engagement & Wellness Programs: Promotes local and enterprise-wide engagement and corporate citizenship initiatives by communicating and leading efforts to include volunteer/community service activities, recognition programs, and site action team activities. Educates and assists employees on benefits and Vitality programs. Coordinate local wellness events including biometric screenings and flu shots


Talent Management: Partners with management on completion of performance reviews and talent review process. Educates and assists employees on career development and continuing education opportunities through McKesson Center for Learning and Skillport. 


Leave of Absence/Safety: Process liaison for leaves of absence, paid time off, Workers Compensation/accident reporting, etc


Timekeeping/Attendance/Performance Tracking: Partners with managers and supervisors to ensure timesheets and attendance for non-exempt employees is tracked accurately. Drafts corrective actions and works with supervisor to ensure warnings are delivered in a timely manner. Works with employee relations consultant on the completion of final warnings and termination reviews

work.name: Alight Solutions
work.summary:
Assist 60,000 employees and retirees with their health and welfare needs via phone


Assist with employeeâ€™s payroll and garnishment inquiries from across 200 locations


Call volume ranged from 30-50 calls a day


Research and open service requests to solve complicated problems


Multi-task between computer programs while delivering knowledgeable feedback efficiently


Utilize CSPro 3 PU, Outlook, Siebel, Lync, Lotus Sametime Connect, Maestro, TBA System, Genesys, Imaging, Lotus Notes 6.52, GRIPT, Impersonation, PeopleSoft, JAT, UPoint, eGain, webchat

work.name: Crane Worldwide Logistics
work.summary:
HR Employee Relations: assisted with the implementation of a Performance Management System (WingSpan), audited all employees on excel, conference calls, compiled data on how to enter international best company contests & CSR reports for HR Vice President, created HR crossword puzzle for company newsletter, performed UAT testing


Benefits Dept: assisted with the implementation of a Wellness Portal, conference calls, created new hire benefit folders, updated employee addresses in Benergy Portal (Benefit Enrollment System), filed


Payroll Dept: analyzed payroll codes for overtime employee hours, scanned and filed W-2 tax forms, created payroll cd password log on excel, audited employee garnishments


Compensation Dept: updated job descriptions by adding LMS training courses etc


Recruiting Dept: created excel billing tables to organize Ceridian invoices from employee drug screenings, filed I-9 forms/employee folders, helped with Recruiting /Payroll informational sessions, attended monthly HR staff meetings, pushed resumes on Ceridian Recruiter site, communicated through professional Outlook email system, directed & answered employee questions during walk-ins

volunteer.summary: Volunteered every summer doing mission projects across Texas with the EMERGE college ministry
